name: Learning how to communicate good
description: Writing about and explaining your game, code, and key breakthroughs can be challenging. It's also some of the most important work you can do to get users excited about your project, and share your learnings with other developers. In this talk, we'll be exploring some of the best tips and tricks to communicate effectively, and launch with the biggest possible bang.

speakers.name: Vera
speakers.bio: Elena leads communications and writing at Lattice. Previously, she was a deal partner on the a16z crypto investing team, and worked in traditional finance before that. She enjoys repertory cinema and tycoon games.
